product_name: Swiss Army Explorer Knife with Pouch
long_description: The Swiss Army Explorer knife with pouch features 2 blades and other tools for traveling, including scissors, magnifying glass, phillips screwdriver, corkscrew and hook. Also includes can opener with screwdriver, bottle opener with screwdriver and wire stripper, reamer with sewing eye, tweezers, toothpick and key ring. Nylon handle, aluminum housing and durable, stainless-steel components. Includes rugged pouch with belt loop. Crafted by Victorinox of Switzerland.
short_description: The Swiss Army Explorer knife with pouch features 2 blades and other tools for traveling, including scissors, magnifying glass, phillips screwdriver, corkscrew and hook.
